DOC.brief_summary: The study is intended to measure infant comfort, behavior, and sleep when consuming study formula with prebiotics compared to infants who consume a study formula without the prebiotics.
DOC.brief_title: Nutritive Effects of Prebiotics on Early Postnatal Behavioral Measures of Tolerance
DOC.criteria: Singleton, 1435 days of age at baseline Term infant with birth weight of a minimum of 2500 grams Solely formulafed Signed Informed Consent and Protected Health Information authorization History of underlying metabolic or chronic disease, congenital malformation, or immunocompromised Feeding difficulties or formula intolerance Maternal history of illicit drug use or psychiatric disease
